# SDD - Pull Request

### Description

- What was done?
- Why was it done?

### Change type

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Improving code
- [ ] Documentation

### Checklist

#### Responsiveness

- [ ] Have you tested Desktop?
- [ ] Have you tested Tablet?
- [ ] Have you tested Mobile?

#### Security

- [ ] Tests were added?
- [ ] The documentation was updated (if needed.)
